original:
The 
As of December 2023, the list comprises 46 companies from 17 countries and 261 individuals whose business activities with Russia contribute to increasing Russian revenues and, subsequently, the military budget that supports the ongoing conflict in Ukraine. This list stands in contrast to the international boycott of Russia, which saw over 1,000 companies withdraw or divest from the country following the invasion.

The NACP regards
sampled:
The 
As of December 2023, the list comprises 46 companies from 17 sovereignties and 261 individuals whose business activities with Russia contribute to increasing Russian revenues and, subsequently, the military budget that supports the ongoing conflict in Ukraine. This list stands in contrast to the international boycott with Russia, which saw over 1,000 companies withdraw or divest from the country following the invasion.

The NACP regards
